txt.en: Gadda will be intrigued to hear that the defences are aimed against Stangard
Gadda will want to hear that experiments with poison are underway
Gadda will want to hear of the symbols and drawings on the assembled map
In order to prove that evil deeds are afoot in Eorlsmead Tower, evidence must be gathered.
Gadda will want to investigate the blue robes further
This blue scrap of cloth strikes you as odd. It does not seem to belong to a Rohirrim, by the look of it. Perhaps there is more to find that would indicate its source.
There is likely evidence of betrayal somewhere in the tower.\n\nYou should collect any evidence you find in the tower.

'Gadda's concerns are well-founded. There is much going on here that Stanric could not have known about when he was alive, for I am sure he would not have approved. I can let you explore the tower, but I fear to rouse the suspicion of my peers.\n\n'There is much evidence here of Sithric's dire corruption. Find any such evidence you can and bring it back to Gadda; hopefully, it will aid his cause.'
Swithulf is at the Eorlsmead Tower.\n\nYou should speak with Swithulf and confirm the evidence you have collected.
'Gadda will want to know as much as you can find out, so search well.'
'Aye, this is everything I had noticed as well. I do not think anything has been missed.\n\n'I was starting to worry that I was losing my wits, but I am relieved that you have reacted as I did!'
Gather evidence of the betrayal in the tower
